 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּם‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==garlic==; — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּמִים‎</span> [[Num.11.5|Num 11:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) (***allium sativum***, [[BDB#Linn|Linn]], [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 336</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. DB ii. 110</sup> [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB 448</sup> (or ***allium Ascalonicum***, compare [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]], after [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>FFP 430</sup>; see this and [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Flora 789</sup> for many kinds of ***allium***); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תּוּמָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šûmu***</u></abbr>). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁמָתִי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁמָה‎</span> infra.
